3.1 The scope of services is determined by the respective offer.

3.2 The Provider is responsible for purchasing and preparing the cocktails. This includes hard plastic cups, sweets, straws, fruits and the associated alcohol.

3.3 A bar counter can be provided for an additional charge.

4.2 Payment is made as specified in the offer, usually by bank transfer or TWINT.

4.3 In case of late payment, default interest of 5% p.a. will be charged.

legal.privacy_content:
Privacy Policy

Black Lodge – Cocktail Planner App

Last updated: February 2026

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

1. Data Controller

Black Lodge
Mario Kantharoobarajah
Birkenstrasse 3
CH-4123 Allschwil
Switzerland

Email: the.blacklodge@outlook.com
Phone: +41 79 778 48 61

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

2. Data We Collect

We collect and process the following personal data:

• Email address (for authentication and account login)
• Order data (selected cocktails, quantities, prices)
• Customer data (name, address, event details for orders)
• Technical data (Firebase User ID, device tokens for notifications)

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

3. Purpose of Data Processing

The collected data is used for the following purposes:

• Providing and managing your user account
• Creating and managing offers and orders
• Generating PDF documents (offers, invoices, shopping lists)
• Communication regarding your orders
• Improving our services

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

4. Legal Basis

Processing is based on the following legal grounds under Swiss Data Protection Act (DSG):

• Contract fulfillment (offer creation, order processing)
• Legitimate interests (app improvement)
• Consent (where required)

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

5. Data Storage and Transfers

5.1 Cloud Services
We use Firebase (Google Cloud Platform) for:
• Authentication (Firebase Authentication)
• Data storage (Cloud Firestore)
• App hosting (Firebase Hosting)

Google is certified under the EU-US Data Privacy Framework. Servers are located in the EU/EEA.

5.2 Retention Period
Your data is stored as long as your account is active. After termination, data will be deleted within 30 days, unless legal retention obligations exist.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

6. Your Rights

You have the following rights:

• Right of access: You can request information about your stored data.
• Right to rectification: You can have incorrect data corrected.
• Right to deletion: You can request deletion of your data.
• Right to restriction: You can restrict the processing of your data.
• Data portability: You can receive your data in a common format.
• Right to object: You can object to the processing.
• Withdrawal: You can withdraw consent at any time.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

7. Data Security

We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures:

• Encrypted data transmission (TLS/SSL)
• Access restrictions and authentication
• Regular security updates
• Firebase Security Rules to protect data

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

8. Cookies and Tracking

The app itself does not use cookies. However, Firebase may set technically necessary cookies for authentication.

We do not use advertising tracking.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

9. Changes

We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy as needed. The current version is available in the app under Settings > Privacy Policy.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

10. Contact and Right to Complain

For privacy questions:
Email: the.blacklodge@outlook.com

Complaints can be addressed to the Federal Data Protection and Information Commissioner (FDPIC):
https://www.edoeb.admin.ch
